comments.body: Can we not shove this into `ROOT_OBJECT_LIBRARY` to always `target_include_directories( ... PRIVATE res)`?
Probably, but I will rewrite a lot of the `ROOT_*` functions later using new features of CMake 3.9, so that's when I planned to do it.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +23,27 @@
ROOT_OBJECT_LIBRARY(Foundation ${sources})
target_include_directories(Foundation PRIVATE res)

ROOT_OBJECT_LIBRARY(Foundation_Stage1 ${sources}) # used by rootcling_stage1
